decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (#1 Position of proposed shed, TGO and #3 Photoshop mock up. Received: 11/03/2015.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding (garden room) hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as Flat 1, 19 Harvard Road.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the ground floor flat
